channel.description: Recent content in Mitaka on 項 思 偉 ~ Aal Izz Well!

item.title: OpenStack RESTful API example(Mitaka)
item.description: token-request.json file { "auth": { "identity": { "methods": [ "password" ], "password": { "user": { "domain": { "name": "Default" }, "name": "admin", "password": "openstack" } } }, "scope": { "project": { "domain": { "name": "Default" }, "name": "admin" } } } } get the token export TOKEN=`curl -si -d @token-request.json -H "Content-type: application/json" \ http://localhost:35357/v3/auth/tokens | awk '/X-Subject-Token/ {print $2}'`
